overview:
Matt joined Arts Alliance Media to lead technical development in July 2007. Matt now oversees all aspects of software engineering and research within AAM across both the digital cinema and home initiatives.

Matt recently lead an informatics initiative at the Conway Institute for Biomedical Research, and has previously served as CTO for both an internet-based communications startup and Primus Telecoms, Europe. He has led many technical initiatives in diverse fields such as disease research, digital online interaction and telecommunications.

Matt holds a Ph.D. in Electrical Engineering, specialising in the areas of artificial intelligence and bioinformatics.
